languages.text: "Не думаю, что это хорошая идея. Слизнеплесень... желудок должен привыкнуть к ней. Понадобится года два, может три".
"I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что это хорошая идея. Слизнеплесень... желудок должен привыкнуть к ней. Понадобится года два, может три".

traits.locale_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... takes a while for the stomach to get used to. Two years, maybe three."
"I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... takes a while for the stomach to get used to. Two years, maybe three."
"I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."
"I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."
"I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."
"I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."

languages.text: «No creo que sea buena idea. El limoho... es algo a lo que hay que acostumbrarse. El estómago necesita dos o tres años para hacerse a ello».
languages.original_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."

traits.locale_text: «No creo que sea buena idea. El limoho... es algo a lo que hay que acostumbrarse. El estómago necesita dos o tres años para hacerse a ello».

languages.text: 「いい考えとは思えんよ。カビスライムは…なかなかに慣れない味なんだ。胃が慣れるまでに2年、いや、3年はかかる」
languages.original_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."

traits.locale_text: 「いい考えとは思えんよ。カビスライムは…なかなかに慣れない味なんだ。胃が慣れるまでに2年、いや、3年はかかる」

languages.text: “这恐怕不是什么好主意。霉菌的味道……得慢慢才能习惯，您的胃恐怕得花上两三年的时间才能适应。”
languages.original_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕不是什么好主意。霉菌的味道……得慢慢才能习惯，您的胃恐怕得花上两三年的时间才能适应。”

languages.text: "Ich halte das für keine gute Idee. Schimmelschleim ... ist nur etwas für Kenner. Es dauert zwei, manchmal drei Jahre, bis Euer Magen sich daran gewöhnt hat."
languages.original_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich halte das für keine gute Idee. Schimmelschleim ... ist nur etwas für Kenner. Es dauert zwei, manchmal drei Jahre, bis Euer Magen sich daran gewöhnt hat."

languages.text: « Je pense pas que ça soit une bonne idée. La moisissure... Faut un certain temps pour que l'estomac s'y habitue. Je dirais deux ans minimum, voire trois pour les plus délicats. »
languages.original_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense pas que ça soit une bonne idée. La moisissure... Faut un certain temps pour que l'estomac s'y habitue. Je dirais deux ans minimum, voire trois pour les plus délicats. »

languages.text: "Bunun iyi bir fikir olduğunu sanmıyorum. Küf balçığı... Zamanla alışılan bir tada sahip. Midenizin aşina olması için iki, belki de üç yıl geçmesi gerekir."
languages.original_text: "I don't think that's a good idea. Mouldslime... is something of an acquired taste. Takes two years, maybe three for your stomach to get used to it."
